attributes.action: Abolish the devolved Parliaments of Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The name of our country is The "United" Kingdom, and with devolution there are few signs of us being "United". The devolved Parliaments leave out "England" - how is that right? England does not equal the UK, nor does the UK equal England - as is perceived by many. This is down to devolution. We are not a Federal nation - let's keep it that way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
